body:
A special day to honor one of our nation’s greatest heroes. 🇺🇸

If only he could have been here to guide the BLM movement. Without a guiding figure to ensure that violence and hate (and outside invaders like Antifa stinking up the joint) won’t be a part of the fight for change, there won’t be meaningful change in America.

My dad (also right wing) asked me back in June that the way to determine if there’s a problem is to ask yourself the question: “Would you want to be a black man in America?” If the answer is no, then there is a problem, and if the answer is yes, then there isn’t a problem. The answer is no, so change is needed.

We need to remember MLK’s teachings of nonviolence and love to guide us. Love our fellow man and woman, respect their wishes and actions unless they negatively impact us or others, help those who are in need, and keep the faith, no matter what God or higher being we pray to.

God bless America and God bless Martin Luther King Jr. 🇺🇸

We need to remember MLK’s teachings of nonviolence and love to guide us. Love our fellow man and woman, respect their wishes and actions unless they negatively impact us or others, help those who are in need, and keep the faith, no matter what God or higher being we pray to.

God bless America and God bless Martin Luther King Jr. 🇺🇸

guild.description:
Hi. Are you right-wing? 

Do you believe that people should be judged by the content of their character over the color of their skin?

Do you believe that we shouldn't take into account race, religion, or nationality when determining who are good people or not?

Do you denounce racists, Anti-semites, white nationalists and neo-Nazis while also largely supporting the "white-nationalist, neo-nazi, racist, anti-semetic" Donald J. Trump and GOP?

Then this is the guild for you.

Then this is the guild for you.
guild.name: RightWingAgainstAltRight

body:
>Without a guiding figure to ensure that violence and hate (and outside invaders like Antifa stinking up the joint) won’t be a part of the fight for change, there won’t be meaningful change in America.

This goes for so much more than racial issues. We've seen about a hundred "movements" now whose only leader is a hashtag - some large, some small - and what they all have in common is that they didn't get a single fucking thing accomplished.

Actual tangible change requires leadership. Hashtags generate noise.
